name: Prima Materia (ptro)
description:
Descend into the depths in search of the PRIMA MATERIA, the first matter and the base of all reality as we know it. Fight monsters who would stop you from progressing, and defeat hellish mini bosses to steal their power for your own ends. Defeat those who guard the PRIMA MATERIA and welcome the void that devours our world.

How to play:

  • Left Click - attack / select (skip the opening text crawl)
  • WASD - movement
  • Enter - start

work-in-progress

Developed by Animal Village for Metroidvania Month 15
